**Example 1: DescribeWorkspaceNameExist**

检查工作空间是否存在

Input: 

```
tccli cloudstudio DescribeWorkspaceNameExist --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --Name test \
    --CloudStudioSessionTeam cloudstudio-devops
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "Data": null,
        "RequestId": "6d6a1d78-9c62-4e5d-92fb-5e1361425b7e"
    }
}
```
